page.title: 02A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: In the morning I get up at 7.00am. I watch TV until half past then there is a mad rush to get the bus to school. I spend the day wishing for 3.25pm when school finishes & we all rush home for 'Sons & Daughters' and children's TV. Over tea my Dad askes me what lessons I had. Sometimes Nicola calls for me and we go up in my bedroom and play records. I have Wham posters all over my walls. Otherwise I meet my friend Joanne at Langley Park and we usually walk around or sit on Lane Top steps with some other kids until 9.00pm. By then my mum is in from work so I talk to her for about half an hour then I do my homework and go to bed about 11.00pm.
